name: sbom-dropbear-ssh-2012.55
description: The Dropbear SSH component included in the firmware has a version number of 2012.55. The version information was discovered through string matching in the binary file. No known CVE records for this version were found in the NVD database.

name: sbom-dropbear-ssh-2012.55-updated
notes: Although no directly related CVE was found, version 2012.55 may be outdated. It is recommended to check the Dropbear changelog and security bulletins.

name: sbom-ushare-1.1a
description: uShare DLNA server component, version 1.1a. Analysis revealed multiple dependent libraries and their associated security vulnerabilities.
notes: The file has been stripped, making it impossible to directly retrieve additional version information. It is recommended to check other parts of the system for more accurate version data.

name: sbom-libupnp-1.6.x
description: The libupnp library, version 1.6.x (specific version unknown), contains multiple high-risk vulnerabilities: CVE-2016-8863 (heap overflow, CVSS 9.8), CVE-2016-6255 (arbitrary file write, CVSS 7.5), and CVE-2012-5958 (stack overflow).
notes: Further confirmation of the exact version of libupnp is required to assess more precise security risks.

name: sbom-libixml-unknown
description: libixml library, version unknown, no known vulnerability records found.
notes: The version information is unknown and requires further analysis and confirmation.

name: sbom-uclibc-0.9.30
description: The uClibc C standard library component, version 0.9.30, contains multiple critical vulnerabilities: CVE-2015-8776 (remote code execution, CVSS 9.8) and CVE-2016-2225 (integer overflow DoS, CVSS 7.5).
notes: It is recommended to upgrade to version 0.9.33.2 or later.

name: sbom-ld.so-1.7.0
description: The dynamic linker ld.so, version 1.7.0, no known vulnerability records found.
notes: version information from the dynamic linker's internal string

name: sbom-linux-kernel-2.6.31
description: Linux kernel component, version 2.6.31, contains vulnerability CVE-2010-4258 (local denial of service, CVSS 4.9).
notes: The kernel version is outdated; it is recommended to upgrade to a long-term support version.

name: sbom-busybox-1.01
description: BusyBox toolset component, version 1.01, built on 2015.05.14-11:58+0000. No known vulnerability records for this version were found in the NVD database.
notes: This is a custom-built version from May 2015. It is recommended to check the official BusyBox security advisories to confirm whether version 1.01 contains any unaddressed security vulnerabilities.
